title: R Package with Functions for Working with Python
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from kwb-r options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))    # Download and install kwb.swmm in R install.packages('kwb.python')  # Browse the kwb.swmm manual pages help(package = 'kwb.python')

title: conda_export — conda_export
text: condaenv name path conda environment export export_dir export directory (default: tempdir())

title: conda_py_install — conda_py_install
text: combined installation conda/py packages one call

title: conda_py_install — conda_py_install
text: env_name name conda environment pkgs named list conda/py packages install (default: list(conda = "python", py = NULL)) ... additional arguments passed install_miniconda

title: install_miniconda — install_miniconda
code: install_miniconda(   path = reticulate::miniconda_path(),   update = TRUE,   force = FALSE )

title: install_miniconda — install_miniconda
text: path path Miniconda installed. Note installer support paths containing spaces. See miniconda_path details default path used reticulate. update Boolean; update latest version Miniconda install? (default: TRUE) force Boolean; force re-installation Miniconda already installed requested path? (default: FALSE)

title: install_miniconda — install_miniconda
text: installs Miniconda requested path (skips case already installed, reticulate otherwise throw error!)

title: run_django — run_django
text: condaenv name/path conda environment Django app cmd command (default: "runserver") path_manage.py relative/absolute path "manage.py" (default: tools/manage.py")
